title: [HOLD for payment 2024-06-28] [$250] [CRITICAL] [UX Reliability] The chat finder page shows duplicated result for a moment
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: Break down in numbered steps

1. Create Workspace as Alice
1. Add couple members including Bob
1. Create couple rooms on that workspace
1. Sign into an account off Bob
1. Turn on the focus mode
1. Sign out and sign back in as bob
1. In chat search page search for the name of the room on the policy
1. Open it the room from the Search page

Expected result: Describe what you think should've happened

There should only be one row for that chat

Actual result: None

Create Workspace as Alice 1. Add couple members including Bob 1. Create couple rooms on that workspace 1. Sign into an account off Bob 1. Turn on the focus mode 1. Sign out and sign back in as bob 1. In chat search page search for the name of the room on the policy 1. Open it the room from the Search page ## Expected Result: Describe what you think should've happened There should only be one row for that chat ## Actual Result: Describe what actually happened The specific chat is duplicated in the search results ## Workaround: Can the user still use Expensify without this being fixed?
